dillon.gameAPI.mapping

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • dillon.gameAPI.mapping.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all of the information regarding how a map should be.
    Since:
    V2.0
    Author:
    Dillon - Github dg092099
